Brooklyn Historical Society
Newtown poll records
Newtown (Queens County, N.Y.)
1978.178
0.08 Linear Feet in one folder
1879 The collection contains poll lists for District 2 on November 4, 1879, certified by James W. Smith, Clerk. The poll list includes voter names. A0088
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Newtown poll records, 1978.178, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1978.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Newtown (Queens County, N.Y.) Queens County (N.Y.) Queens (New York, N.Y.) Voters' lists Newtown (Queens County, N.Y.)
